statements: DELETE FROM cloud_data_replication WHERE region_name = 'us-east' AND data_center = 'DC1';
DELETE FROM cloud_data_replication WHERE region_name = 'US' AND data_center = 'East';
DELETE FROM cloud_data_replication WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM cloud_data_replication WHERE last_sync < '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM data_replication WHERE region = 'US' AND data_center = 'NYC';
DELETE FROM data_replication WHERE id IN (SELECT replication_id FROM replication_status WHERE status = 'stopped');
DELETE FROM data_replication WHERE region_id = 3 AND replication_frequency > 5;
DELETE FROM cloud_regions WHERE region_name = 'US East' AND data_center = 'Virginia';
DELETE FROM synchronization_config WHERE region = 'US-East' AND replication_method = 'SYNC';
DELETE FROM cloud_data_center WHERE data_center_location = 'Virginia' AND region_id = 1;
DELETE FROM data_replication_logs WHERE operation_type = 'DELETE' AND operation_time < '2022-01-01';
